nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Inferno Minion Fuel\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Can be used as minion fuel\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"exclusively in the Inferno minion for\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"24 hours!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Replaces \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"4/5 \",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\"of the regular minion\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"production with a \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"specialty \",\"color\":\"aqua\"},{\"text\":\"item.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Speed multiplier: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"15x\",\"color\":\"green\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Specialty: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Magma Cream\",\"color\":\"aqua\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Specialty amount: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"1 to 3\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"INFERNO_HEAVY_MAGMA_CREAM"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
